testcase.name: Lunch Auden and book loan
testcase.system-out: Given I am on Auden website.................................................passed Then I should see home link.................................................passed And I scroll the slider bar to home and end.................................passed Then I should see the corresponding amount on the page......................passed When I scroll the slider bar to the last monthly instalment.................passed Then I should see the corresponding instalment period.......................passed And I click on the repayment calendar button................................passed And I scroll to view the calendar...........................................passed And I select a repayment weekend date form the calendar.....................passed Then I should see a previous working date as default........................passed And I close the browser.....................................................passed
